critique: The document is a legal order regarding land use. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is likely a sense of order and resolution, perhaps with a hint of satisfaction for those who benefit from the land restoration. However, the language is very formal and neutral, so strong emotions are unlikely. The document does not contain strong language, so I will assign low values to all emotions except for surprise, which I will set to 1 since there is no indication of surprise.
